screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ceb file in Apabi Reader 4.5
screenshot.caption: CEB file open in Apabi Reader 4.5

description: If you receive a CEB file, you can open it with Apabi Maker in Windows. You can also convert the file into the CEBX format (or CEBX to CEB) with Apabi Maker.

CEB files are available from the APABI D-Lib library, which contains a collection of Chinese eBooks. The library includes a variety of topics, such as history, literature, politics, economics, business, and management.
NOTE: Apabi Reader and Maker are discontinued.

images.caption: CEB file open in Apabi Reader 4.5
